fullContent.copy: Verify your core setup, make advanced configurations, and gain insights from the Cloudflare Community.
fullContent.title: Welcome to Cloudflare

heroSection.title: Step-by-step guide for your core setup
heroSection.copy: At Cloudflare, we want to help you build something great. Let us walk you through the essential steps you need to take to set up your site.

relatedInfoBlocks.title: Troubleshooting FAQ
relatedInfoBlocks.description: Get answers to common issues you may encounter when adding a new domain to Cloudflare.

relatedInfoBlocks.title: Cloudflare Support
relatedInfoBlocks.description: Still stumped? 95% of all user questions can be solved by searching in the Cloudflare Help Center.

relatedInfoBlocks.title: Cloudflare Community
relatedInfoBlocks.description: Join thousands of bloggers, freelancers, and entrepreneurs that are also using Cloudflare to build something amazing.

fromBlog.title: Learn more from our blog
fromBlog.firstBlurbTitle: High Availability Load Balancers with Maglev
fromBlog.firstBlurbBody: We own and operate physical infrastructure for our backend services. We need an effective way to route arbitrary TCP and UDP traffic between services and also from outside these data centers....
fromBlog.secondBlurbTitle: Health Check Analytics and how you can use it
fromBlog.secondBlurbBody: Health Check Analytics is now live and available to all Pro, Business and Enterprise customers! We are very excited to help decrease your time to resolution and ensure your application reliability is maximised...
fromBlog.thirdBlurbBody: Several months ago, I realized that I had a lot of sensitive files on my computer (my diary, if you must know) that I was afraid of losing, but I didn’t feel comfortable putting them in something like Google Drive or Dropbox. Introducing UtahFS....
